summary: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.
cast: Treat Williams|Famke Janssen|Anthony Heald|Kevin J. O'Connor|Wes Studi|Derrick O'Connor|Jason Flemyng|Cliff Curtis|Clifton Powell|Trevor Goddard|Djimon Hounsou|Una Damon|Clint Curtis|Warren Takeuchi|Linden Banks|Jack Anker|Anne-Simone|Leanne Adachi|Melanie Carr|Colin McCarlie|Jim May|Jana Sommers|Marti Baldecchi|Rana Morrison
title: Deep Rising: El misterio de las profundidades
